A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I am simply stunned by the critics' reviews--no doubt some received special \"gift\" packages from Disney.  I can only echo all the other negative reviews on this site\, Twitter\, Facebook\, and Youtube.  Last Jedi was an overhyped movie with numerous plot holes\, inconsistencies\, and cringe-worthy moments.  Ladies and gentleman\, be prepared to see a beloved character suckling from a creature's teet and another flying through space like Superman--I am not making this up.  I sincerely question whether test audiences screened this movie.  My high expectations were crushed and I left the theatre feeling disappointed.  I don't plan to see Last Jedi a second time and wonder if a recovery is possible with episode IX.
